props.Name: Words of Power
props.Description: Empowers Blessing spell and unlocks Anathema

props.Name: Martyr
props.Description: Gives away Endurance to adjacent allies each turn. If they are targeted by a Shadow or Death effect, there is a chance to redirect it to the hero.

props.Name: Vindication
props.Description: Unlocks Vindication spell upgrade group.

props.Name: Virtue
props.Description: all Light spell effects are stronger on the hero Shadow/Chaos resist

props.Name: Kindness
props.Description: positive spells are stronger on allies

props.Name: Moonborn
props.Description: Gains bonus Spellpower on surface at night, receives additional Shadow Resistance

props.Name: Asceticism
props.Description: Hero receives {1} Death Resistance, {2} Tradition Alignment and {3} Willpower.

props.Name: Penance
props.Description: Charity and Tradition Alignment boost hero's Willpower, Integrity is modified 1.5x times for these Principles.

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Holy Arts/Redemption Mastery/Baptized by Fire.png
props.Name: Baptized by Fire
props.Description: Unlocks Vindication spell upgrade group.

props.Name: Zeal
props.Description: Hero receives {1} Chaos Resistance, {2} Law Alignment and {3} Spellpower

props.Name: Purity
props.Description: Hero receives {1} Shadow Resistance, {2} Charity Alignment and {3} Spirit

props.Name: Witchcraft
props.Description: Hero uses vile tricks to win his battles. His melee attacks apply {1} Poison counters on each strike that hits.

props.Name: Mercurial
props.Description: Grants {2} Dexterity and Defense bonus equal to {1}% of hero's Concealment.

props.Name: Wicked Curses
props.Description: Unlocks and provides Spellpower bonus
props.Dev_Notes: All of your curses are now stacking unlimitedly

props.Name: Scarecrow
props.Description: Targets of your spells lose {2} Morale. Grants Fearsome {1} which will passively reduce the morale of all enemies who have you In Sight when you perform hostile actions.
props.Dev_Notes: Grants Fearsome {1} which will passively reduce the morale of all enemies who have you In Sight when you perform hostile actions.

props.Name: Dominator
props.Description: Hero's Willpower is increased by {2}. Decreases the chance with which targets resist your Mind-Affecting spells by {1}%.

props.Name: Malignancy
props.Description: Restores {1} Essence for the hero when killing an enemy.
props.Dev_Notes: Killing an Immobilized or Fatigued enemy restores {1} Essence for the hero.

props.Name: Voodoo Lore
props.Description: Unlocks Voodoo Curse spell and Voodoo upgrades.

props.Passives: AddProp(Spell Upgrade Groups, Aphotic);ParamMod(Shadow Mastery Score,{1})
props.Name: Aphotic Depths
props.Description: Unlocks Aphotic upgrades and increases your final Shadow Mastery score by {1}%.

props.Name: Darkvision
props.Description: Hero is no longer hindered by Concealment effects (no misses, does not decrease Visibility). Heroes that already have Darkvision receive a +{1} bonus to Sight Range

props.Name: Dark Omens
props.Description: Grants Resistance Penetration equal to {1}% of your Intelligence.

props.Name: Dark Restoration
props.Description: unit loses ability to act, receives 100 light resistance penalty

props.Name: Shadow Web
props.Description: Trap spell that will Entangle its victims and apply heavy Concealment to their location.

props.Name: Shadow Might
props.Description: sp from concealment

props.Name: Midnight Blades
props.Description: Hero's attacks deal {1}% additional Shadow damage.
props.Dev_Notes: Grants you Shadow Blade spell which may add {1}% Shadow damage to all melee attacks from a Slashing or Piercing weapon.

props.Name: Telepathy
props.Description: Decreases the chance with which targets resist your Mind-Affecting spells by {1}%.

props.Name: Psionic Energies
props.Description: Decreases the chance with which targets resist your Mind-Affecting spells by {1}%.

props.Name: Psionic Shock
props.Description: Decreases the chance with which targets resist your Mind-Affecting spells by {1}%.

props.Name: Schadenfreude
props.Description: When a curse you cast is resisted, a random target adjacent to the original one is affected.

props.Name: Forbidden Knowledge
props.Description: Morbid curiousity leads the hero to examine his fallen foes closer. Experience gained from kills is increased by {1}

props.Name: Crystal Shards
props.Description: Grants Resistance Penetration equal to {1}% of your Intelligence.

props.Name: Corrupted Gemstones
props.Description: Through foul sorcery, hero transforms the internal organs of his fallen foes into grizzly jewelry. It has no magical power, but sells well to the blissfully ignorant. Amount of gold in corpse loot is increased by {1}%.

props.Name: Fearsome Energies
props.Description: Grants Fearsome {1} which will passively reduce the morale of all enemies who have you In Sight when you perform hostile actions.

props.Name: Fel Cunning
props.Description: Grants hero a +{3} Intelligence bonus and provides a {1} Resistance Penetration against targets that would qualify for a Sneak Attack at the time of casting. Whenever such "sneak spell" succeeds, hero gains {2} Focus.
props.Dev_Notes: Grants {3} Intelligence and provides a bonus {1} Resistance Penetration against targets that would qualify for a Sneak Attack at the time of casting. Increases Sneak Damage by {2}%.

props.Name: The Eye of Night
props.Description: Unlocks a Mode that changes hero's vision. In this Mode, the less light there is, the better is hero's Visibility. Passively increases Base Focus by 10% of hero's Concealment (cannot exceed 100).

props.Name: Fungi Expert
props.Description: Each time you consume Fungi, you restore up to {1} Essence.

props.Name: Shades Weaver
props.Description: Hero's attacks apply {1} Ensnare counters to the target. With enough such counters, target will be immobilized until their default attack frees them from the web.
props.Dev_Notes: Grants {3} Intelligence and provides a bonus {1} Resistance Penetration against targets that would qualify for a Sneak Attack at the time of casting. Increases Sneak Damage by {2}%.

props.Name: Shadow Step
props.Description: Grants hero a special Move Action that is used as a teleport within 2 cell range and costs Essence instead of the normal move costs.

props.Name: Lacerate
props.Description: *Slash* attacks will inflict {1}% more Bleeding Counters plus an additional {2} per hit (each counter resulting in 1% max Endurance loss per turn and per action as well as 1% less Toughness restored).
props.Dev_Notes: A precise blade attack of Piercing damage with 50% Armor Penetration that will inflict Bleeding (1 counter per 10 damage dealt, each resulting in 1% max Endurance loss per turn and per action as well as 1% less Toughness restored).

props.Name: Dagger Specialization
props.Description: Hero's Attack value is increased by {1}% when using a Dagger, Knife, Stiletto or a Dirk

props.Name: Long Sword Specialization
props.Description: Hero's Attack value is increased by {1}% when using a Long Sword, Broad Sword, Rapier or Katana

props.Name: Short Sword Specialization
props.Description: Hero's Attack value is increased by {1}% when using a Short Sword, Scimitar, Falchion or Kris

props.Name: Axe Specialization
props.Description: Hero's Attack value is increased by {1}% when using an Axe weapon.

props.Name: Mace Specialization
props.Description: Hero's Attack value is increased by {1}% when using a Mace or Club

props.Name: Flail Specialization
props.Description: Hero's Attack value is increased by {1}% when using a Flail or a Heavy Flail

props.Name: Hammer Specialization
props.Description: Hero's Attack value is increased by {1}% when using a Battle Hammer, Malus or War Hammer

props.Name: Pollaxe Specialization
props.Description: Hero's Attack value is increased by {1}% when using a Pollaxe weapon.

props.Name: Flail Disarm
props.Description: Removes target's main weapon as well as 1 Action point and {1} Focus. The target recovers the weapon on its first turn in the next round.

props.Name: Decapitate
props.Description: A wicked strike that slays target non-Monstrous Living creature if it the target fails a Defense roll against your Attack divided by 10 or by 2 if your make this as a Sneak Attack.

props.Name: Pole Block
props.Description: You have a {1} additional chance to Parry when wielding a Pole Arm weapon.

props.Passives: Hero Obj Group Parameter Mod(weapon group,dagger,mastery,attack mod,25)
props.Name: Stunning Blow
props.Description: Passive Interrupt chance {1} for Head Smash, Slam, Crush and Heavy Swing attacks.

props.Passives: WeaponParamBuff(Weapon group,Spears,Long Reach,Range,1);WeaponPropBuff(Weapon group,Spears, standard passives,no retaliation);WeaponPropBuff(Weapon group,Spears, std bools, limited diagonals);
props.Name: Long Reach
props.Description: Your Speak Poke attacks have 1 additional range (limited diagonals).
props.Dev_Notes: old: GroupPropAdd(Name,Attack, std bools, limited diagonals);GroupParamBonus(Name,Attack,Long Reach,Range,1);

props.Name: Dismember
props.Description: A brutal action that adds Fearsome {1} to the hero upon execution.

props.Name: Bash
props.Description: Hero's attacks will apply Bash effect on hit, reducing target's Focus and ATB position.

props.Name: Cleave (Axe)
props.Description: Hero's killing blows will deal up to {2}% of the remaining damage to the next enemy in line, up to {1} times, losing {3}% of damage each time.
props.Dev_Notes: Passive version: GroupFilterPropAdd(not(damage type, Piercing|Bludgeoning) tring(weapon size, Large|Huge),Cleave,Passives,Cleave(2,50,50-{Strength})); A power attack that will deal the remainer of its damage to the next enemy in line if original target has been slain.

props.Name: En Garde
props.Description: Increases your Defense values by {1}% when using a Long Sword and another {2} if your left hand is free (any weapon).

props.Name: Touche
props.Description: Increases your Attack values by {1}% when using Rapiers.

props.Name: Gutting Stab
props.Description: Increases sneak attack damage by {1}% when using a Dagger.

props.Name: Spinning Axes
props.Description: Hero receives {1}% damage bonus when throwing Hand Axes, and gains +{2} Parry bonus when wielding 2 Hand Axes.

props.Name: Spinning Scythes
props.Description: Enables Cadence for two-handed Scythes, adds {1}% Parry Chance and {2}% Instant Attack accuracy bonus while under Cadence effect.

props.Name: Chop Off
props.Description: An attack aimed at an unprotected limb of the target, cannot inflict more than {1}% of target's Toughness. Bleeding and Wound counters
props.Dev_Notes: Passive version: GroupFilterPropAdd(not(damage type, Piercing|Bludgeoning) tring(weapon size, Large|Huge),Cleave,Passives,Cleave(2,50,50-{Strength})); An attack aimed at an unprotected limb of the target, cannot inflict more than {1}% of target's Toughness. Bleeding and Wound counters

props.Name: Mighty Thrust
props.Description: Blade Thrust and Twohanded Blade Thrust attacks will deal additional damage based on hero's Strength.
props.Actives: ActionMod(Sword Swing|Twohanded Sword Swing, Str Dmg Modifier({1}%)

props.Name: Quick Thrust
props.Skill_Or_Requirements: Long Sword Specialization;Short Sword Specialization;Dagger Specialization
props.Description: Stab, Blade Thrust and Twohanded Thrust have their Action Point cost reduced by {1}%.

props.Passives: Hero Obj Group Parameter Mod(weapon group,dagger,mastery,attack mod,25)
props.Name: Gutting Spike Stab
props.Description: Poking the target with the buttspike will inflict {1}% more Bleeding and have an additional fixed Critical chance of {2}%.

props.Passives: WeaponPropBuff(weapon group,Staves, Broad Reach,standard passives,broad reach);WeaponParamBuff(weapon group,Staves,Side Damage Mod|Side Attack Mod,{1});
props.Name: Broad Reach
Hook Pull
props.Description: A combat technique that allows engaging an opponent on an adjacent cell by either pooling them to you or yourself to them, depending on who has greater Weight. Entangling in Melee will reduce target's Action Points by 1 and force them to roll against Disarm and Offbalance.
props.Dev_Notes: Passive version: GroupFilterPropAdd(not(damage type, Piercing|Bludgeoning) tring(weapon size, Large|Huge),Cleave,Passives,Cleave(2,50,50-{Strength}));

props.Passives: ActionMod(Pole Push, Force Mod({1}));ActionMod(Pole Push, Instant Attack Mod({2}));ActionMod(Pole Push, Counter Attack Mod({2}));
props.Name: Push Back (Polearm)
props.Description: Pole Push generates {1} more Force and receives {2} Attack bonus when made as a Counter or Instant Attack.

props.Name: Shieldbreaker
props.Description: Your attacks with a Hammer will decrease enemy armor's (or parrying weapon) durability {1}% more than normally.

props.Name: Shockwave
props.Description: Adds {1}% of your weapon's Weight as pure Endurance damage on each attack.
props.Dev_Notes: could be based on damage dealt!

props.Name: Limb Striker
props.Description: Hero's attacks will inflict {1}% more Injury counters
props.Dev_Notes: Limb Strike applies a Movement Penalty ({1}%) when made successfully. Stacks up to 3 times.

props.Name: Pushing Force
props.Description: Hero's strikes generate {1}% more Force, increasing the chance to push enemies away or knock them down. Force can deal Blunt damage if target is propped up again a wall or another obstacle.

props.Name: Crushing Force
props.Description: With this skill, {1}% of damage blocked by enemy armor still goes through as Pure damage. Hero's attacks also deal 2*{1}% more durability damage.

props.Name: Fencing Form
props.Description: Reduces targetASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Parry Chance by {1}% and Stamina costs of all Attacks made with a Blade by {2}%. Adds a +{3} Blade Mastery score modifier.

props.Name: Swordsman Finesse
props.Description: Increases the chance to beat enemyASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Reaction rolls (e.g. against Instant Attacks) by {1}% and adds a {3}% Agility and {2}% Intelligence damage modifier when wielding a Blade.

props.Passives: ActionMod(Heavy Swing]|[Slam, Str Dmg Modifier({1});ActionMod(Heavy Swing]|[Slam, Force Mod({2});
props.Name: Momentous Swing
props.Description: Heavy Swing and Slam attacks will deal additional damage based on hero's Strength and create more Force that may push target away or knock them down.

props.Passives: ActionMod(Sword Swing|Twohanded Sword Swing, Str Dmg Modifier({1}));ActionMod(Sword Swing|Twohanded Sword Swing, Force Mod({2}));
props.Name: Wide Swings
props.Description: Enables the hero to made (Twohanded) Sword Swings against target on their sides. In addition, these attack types deal additional damage based on hero's Strength and create more Force that may push target away or knock them down.

props.Passives: OnParry(Conditional(blade,AddParam(Force Protection, {2})));ActionMod(Hilt Smash, Str dmg modifier({3}));
props.Name: Tight Grip
props.Description: Grants protection against Disarm ({1}%) and {3}% Strength damage modifier for Hilt Smash. When parrying with a Sword, hero gains {2}% Force Protection.

props.Name: Sword Oath
props.Description: While equipped with a sword, hero gains additional Willpower equal to {1}% of their Honor Alignment.

props.Name: Weapon Lock
props.Description: Increases your Defense values by {1}% when using a Long Sword and another {2} if your left hand is free (any weapon).

props.Name: Disarm (Blade)
props.Description: Increases your Defense values by {1}% when using a Long Sword and another {2} if your left hand is free (any weapon).

props.Name: Fine Edge
props.Description: Axes you wield have {1}% passive chance to deal a critical hit. Reduces Impact Area of your Axe attacks by {1}%, increasing the chance to bypass enemy armor.

props.Name: Vicious Edge
props.Description: Hero's strikes with Axes will inflict 3*{1}% more Bleeding. Critical damage is increased by {2}% for all Axes.
props.Dev_Notes: A mighty attack designed to take out an unbalanced opponent, a successful hit will automatically be a Deathblow. Accuracy is reduced by 75%.

props.Name: Anatomy Expert: Trauma
props.Description: Limb Strike has a passive {1}% chance to become Critical and inflicts Minor Injury when successfully so.

props.Name: Nature Empathy
props.Description: Grants {1} Peace Alignment, {2} Wisdom and {3} to all Natural Resistances.

props.Name: Nature's Child
props.Description: Makes Progress a Nemesis Principles

props.Name: Old Way
props.Description: Provides {1} Knowledge, {2} Tradition Alignment and {3} Elemental Resistances.

props.Name: Animal Empathy
props.Description: Savage Mastery score is increased by 20% of your Wisdom. All Animal summon spells receive +{2}% Spellpower bonus and each summoned animal restores 1 Stamina, 2 Focus and 5 Essence per turn for you.

props.Name: Shaded Growth
props.Description: The Trees you summon will destroy the top corpse each turn, restoring {1}% of its Endurance for itself and adding {2}% of it as Essence for yourself.

props.Name: Herbs Lore
props.Description: The Trees you summon will destroy the top corpse each turn, restoring {1}% of its Endurance for itself and adding {2}% of it as Essence for yourself.

props.Name: Natural Remedy
props.Description: The Trees you summon will destroy the top corpse each turn, restoring {1}% of its Endurance for itself and adding {2}% of it as Essence for yourself.

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Life Arts/Sylvan Mastery/Growth from Decay.png
props.Name: Growth from Decay
props.Description: The Trees you summon will destroy the top corpse each turn, restoring {1}% of its Endurance for itself and adding {2}% of it as Essence for yourself.

props.Name: Verdant Shadows
props.Description: murky woods - summoned trees/ents throw additional shadow, gain fire res from concealment...

props.Name: Mushroom Savant
props.Description: lets the hero identify and harvest fungi to be used as consumables or in alchemy

props.Name: Devil-Nose
props.Description: The Trees you summon will destroy the top corpse each turn, restoring {1}% of its Endurance for itself and adding {2}% of it as Essence for yourself.

props.Name: Fresh Winds
props.Description: After casting an Air spell, your next spell will ignore {1}% of target's Resistance.

props.Name: Steadfast
props.Description: Grants the hero Undying {3}, {1}% resistance against Force effects and lowers amount of negative Toughness hero can endure before death by {2}%.

props.Name: Shamanic Lore
props.Description: Divination only produces Savage and Elemental spells and adds +{1} Essence regeneration for this battle whenever a known spell is divined.

props.Name: Savage Rituals
props.Description: Divination only produces Savage and Elemental spells and adds +{1} Essence regeneration for this battle whenever a known spell is divined.

props.Name: Wild Speaker
props.Description: Choose a Wild Animal to become the new member of your party.

props.Name: Feral Dreams
props.Description: Divination only produces Savage and Elemental spells and adds +{1} Essence regeneration for this battle whenever a known spell is divined.

props.Name: Spirit Magic
props.Description: Divination only produces Savage and Elemental spells and adds +{1} Essence regeneration for this battle whenever a known spell is divined.

props.Name: Tribal Leader
props.Description: Honor and Tradition Alignment increases Battle Spirit
props.Dev_Notes: All Orc, Ogre and Troll mercenaries will be 50% less expensive and more loyal.

props.Name: Druidic Lore
props.Description: Sylvan Mastery score is increased by 20% of your Wisdom. Also provides attributes bonuses.

props.Passives: SpellGroupParamMod(Spell tags,Stone,@, Spellpower mod, {1});SpellGroupParamBonus(Spell tags,Stone,@, Spellpower bonus, {2});
props.Image: gen/entity kills/Life Arts/Earth Mastery/Master of Stone.png
props.Name: Master of Stone
props.Lore: Those specializing in the arts of Stone are often seen as blunt, unsophisticated individuals, perhaps because of their their frequent reliance on brute force, but none can deny them the power of will and fortitude.
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower by {2} plus additional {1}% when casting Earth spells

props.Name: Stone Affinity
props.Description: Increases your Slashing Resistance by {1}%, Toughness by {2} and Willpower by {3}

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Life Arts/Earth Mastery/Ashes and Dust.png
props.Name: Ashes and Dust
props.Lore: Ash is the essence of Cycle of Life ASCII_OPEN8211ASCII_CLOSE its beginning and its end The Undead, who defy the cycle, cannot long stand against its power
props.Description: Unlocks Ashen Spell Upgrades
props.Dev_Notes: Ash spells gain additional Spellpower from corpses

props.Name: Clay Sculptor
props.Description: Improves Quick Sand and Clay Blob spells so that the their Immobilize rolls are {1}% more likely to succeed.

props.Passives: SpellGroupParamMod(Spell tags,Clay,@, Spellpower mod, {1});SpellGroupParamBonus(Spell tags,Clay,@, Spellpower bonus, {2});
props.Name: Master of Clay
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower by {2} plus additional {1}% when casting Clay spells
props.Flavor: Clay can shape life or smother it; it can be soft and it can be hard - what better basis to advance the Elemental Arts?

props.Passives: SpellGroupParamMod(Spell tags,Sand,@, Spellpower mod, {1});SpellGroupParamBonus(Spell tags,Sand,@, Spellpower bonus, {2});
props.Image: gen/entity kills/Life Arts/Earth Mastery/Master of Sand.png
props.Name: Master of Sand
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower by {2} plus additional {1}% when casting Sand spells
props.Dev_Notes: Improves Quick Sand and Clay Blob spells so that the their Immobilize rolls are {1}% more likely to succeed.

props.Name: Sand Affinity
props.Description: Increases your Bludgeoning Resistance by {1}%, Endurance by {2} and Wisdom by {3}

props.Name: Killer Instinct
props.Description: Hero gains {1} ATB whenever they deal a critical strike, and {2} Focus whenever they kill a creature.

props.Name: Survival Instinct
props.Description: Hero gains {1} Focus whenever they receive a hit, and also {2} ATB if it is a critical one.

props.Name: Keen Senses
props.Description: Adds {1} to your Detection score, and increases Base Focus by {2}.
props.Dev_Notes: Reduces Defense penalty when using Watch by {1}%

props.Name: Eagle Eye
props.Description: Provides +1 Sight Range bonus and {1} Accuracy (reducing enemy evasion and increasing Critical chance)

props.Name: Broad Sight
props.Description: Hero's Side Sight penalty is reduced by {1}, and Sight Range increased by 1. Grants {2} Evasion - additional passive chance to dodge an attack.

props.Name: Feint Throw
props.Description: Target unit that you In Sight loses 1 action point, 2 Stamina and 10 Focus.

props.Name: Nimble Fingers
props.Description: Using Quick Items costs {1}% less Action Points.
props.Dev_Notes: Hero forces melee targets to make Defense roll against ammo loss.

props.Passives: ActionMod(Use Inventory,ap cost([mod]-{1})); ActionModProp(Use Inventory,action tags([remove]Attack of Opportunity));
props.Name: Quick Swap
props.Description: Hero spends {1}% less Action Points on Use Inventory action and does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity by it.

props.Name: Expert Looter
props.Description: Hero spends 50% less Action Points on Pick Up action. Increases amount of Gold looted by {2}% or gained per Level Up in Arena Mode.

props.Name: Extra Pockets
props.Description: Adds {1} Quick Slots to the hero.

props.Name: Toss Item
props.Description: Toss a Tiny or Small item to an ally within {1} range. If the ally does not have you In Sight, the item is dropped onto the cell he's standing on; otherwise a Reflex roll is made for catch it and put into inventory.

props.Name: Storm of Missiles
props.Description: Special action that throws all of your Quick Slot weapons at the target.

props.Name: Appraiser
props.Description: Hero receives a {1}% bonus to buy and sell prices.

props.Name: Battle Formation
props.Description: Allows you to manually position each of your heroes before battle in a 3x3 size formation.

props.Name: Unlikely Comrades
props.Description: Reduces the number of Principle Clashes in the party by {1}.

props.Name: Warlord
props.Description: Reduces the number of Principle Clashes in the party by 1 for each hero with War Principle.

props.Name: Defender of Faith
props.Description: Reduces the number of Principle Clashes in the party by 1 for each hero with the same Deity as your own.

props.Name: Maneuver: Swap Positions
props.Description: Units in your party can swap their positions. Requires {1} Intelligence for units to use.

props.Name: Reconciler
props.Description: Reduces the impact that Principle Clashes have on the party's Fighting Spirit by {1}%.

props.Name: Dirty Tactics
props.Description: All heroes with Treachery principle receive +{1}% Attack bonus

props.Name: Offensive Formation
props.Description: Adjacent allies gain {1}% Attack in exchange for {2}% Defense.

props.Name: Defensive Formation
props.Description: All adjacent allies receive +{1}% Defense bonus in exchange for {1}/2 Attack.

props.Name: Maneuver: Displace
props.Description: Units in your Party can displace one another. Requires {1} Intelligence for units to use.

props.Name: Common Cause
props.Description: The amount by which Shared Principles increase the party's Battle Spirit is raised by {1}%.
props.Dev_Notes: Increases the Battle Spirit bonus for Comradeship between party members by {1}%. Each two members have a special relationship.

props.Name: Peace Keeper
props.Description: Reduces the number of Principle Clashes in the party by 1 for each hero with War Principle.

props.Name: Noble Tactics
props.Description: All heroes with Honor principle receive +{1}% Defense bonus

props.Passives: AddProp(Custom Props, Search Mode param mod(detection,{1}))
props.Name: Skilled Observer
props.Description: [Search Mode] grants an additional {1}% Detection. [Watching] a unit no longer affects Defense against other units.

props.Name: Command: Secure Location
props.Description: You may issue a command for a member of your party to arrive at the target location adjacent to them and will use the optimal action combination to do so, if able. Cannot be used on units summoned by an ally and requires that target has at least {1} Intelligence

props.Name: Command: Forward!
props.Description: You may issue a command for a member of your party to enter Assault mode.

props.Name: Command: Retreat!
props.Description: You may issue a command for a member of your party to enter Retreat mode. Use this action again (free) to cancel the order or override it with another Command.

props.Name: Command: Hold Position!
props.Description: You may issue a command for a member of your party to enter Defender mode. If they are player-controlled, this will increase their Defense Mod and Morale by {1}% if they choose to 'obey', but reduce Attack and Move Speed by {1}%.
props.Dev_Notes: activate Defend action. Using the Command on an already Defending unit will wake it up. Cannot be used on units summoned by an ally and requires that target has at least {1} Intelligence

props.Passives: ActionParamBonus(Alert Mode, Cooldown, -999);ActionParamBonus(Alert Mode, Ap Cost, -1);
props.Name: Skillful Alertness
props.Description: You can activate Alert mode any number of times per turn for free. Ending round in Alert Mode will restore {1}% more Focus.

props.Name: Sharp Insticts
props.Description: Upon receiving a Sneak Attack, hero gains {1} Focus and {2} ATB. Passively increases Accuracy and Evasion by {3}.

props.Passives: Conditional(string({source_mode}, On Alert), AddPropBuff(@,Passives,ParamBonus(Detection, {1})|ParamBonus(Side Sight Penalty,-1)|ParamBonus(Behind Sight Bonus,1) ));
props.Name: Watchful Alertness
props.Description: Gain +{1} Detection score bonus and +1 side- and hind-vision radius while On Alert. Also protects against Sneak Attacks, letting the hero retain twice as much Defense.

props.Name: Defensive Alertness
props.Description: Increases your Defense by {1}% while On Alert.

props.Name: Scrutiny
props.Description: Search Mode grants an additional {1}% Detection. Increases Attack bonus against Watched targets by {2}%.

props.Name: Throw Mastery
props.Description: Increases Attack and Damage of all Throw actions by {1}%.
props.Dev_Notes: Allows throwing Medium and Large weapons from hand. Increases the range of all Throw actions by 1.

props.Passives: ParamBonus(Poison Counter Applied To Item Mod, {1});ParamBonus(Disease Counter Applied To Item Mod, {1});ParamBonus(Corrosion Counter Applied To Item Mod, {1});
props.Name: Potion Savant
props.Description: Hero applies {1}% more counters with Poison, Disease and Corrosion coatings.

props.Passives: ParamBonus(Poison Counter Applied To Item Mod, {1});ParamBonus(Disease Counter Applied To Item Mod, {1});ParamBonus(Corrosion Counter Applied To Item Mod, {1});
props.Name: Coating Savant
props.Description: Hero applies {1}% more counters with Poison, Disease and Corrosion coatings.

props.Name: March of Marauders
props.Description: All adjacent units receive +{1}% damage. Units with Peace Principle are not affected.

props.Name: Blood for Blood
props.Description: All adjacent units receive +{1}% damage. Units with Peace Principle are not affected.

props.Name: Command: Rest
props.Description: You may issue a command for a member of your party to enter Restoration mode, in which the choose either to Rest, Concentrate or Meditate based on their status and preferences.

props.Name: Protect Ally
props.Description: The party members receive Protect Ally action that allows them to enter Protect mode, preventing melee attacks on the protected unit while they remain on the same cell as them. Missiles have {2} chance to hit the protector instead.

props.Name: Feign Weakness
props.Description: All party members allows them to enter mode that will make enemies believe they are hardly worth killing.

props.Name: Hide Behind Ally
props.Description: All party members receive Hide Behind Ally action that allows them to enter Hiding Behind mode, preventing melee attacks on them while they remain on the same cell as the targeted ally. Missiles have {2} chance to hit the ally instead.

props.Name: Experienced Commander
props.Description: Commands given by the hero are {1}% more likely to be obeyed, have {2} addiitonal range and apply +{3} Morale bonus to targets on being received.

props.Name: Master Commander
props.Description: Commands given by the hero are {1}% more likely to be obeyed, have {2} addiitonal range and apply +{3} Morale bonus to targets on being received.

props.Flavor: Meditation is an art of active inaction.
props.Name: Skillful Meditation
props.Description: Increases the amount of Essence restored through Meditation by {1}%.

props.Name: Skillful Concentration
props.Description: Concentrate action restores {1}% more Focus.

props.Name: Intense Concentration
props.Description: Retains Counter Attack capacity, gains additional Action Points in the next round ({1}% of those remaining)

props.Name: Deep Concentration
props.Description: Restores morale, essence and stamina

props.Flavor: Verbalization, while entertaining to some degree, is still the man's ultimate exercise in futility
props.Name: Stillness
props.Description: Grants {1} Wisdom, {3} Stealth and Detection and provides {2} Psionic and Sonic Resistance

props.Name: Alert Meditation
props.Description: Meditation mode version that does not reduce your Defense or disable your counter attacks, also doubling the amount of damage that can interrupt you. Requires {2} Focus to activate and costs 2 Action Points.

props.Name: Void Meditation
props.Description: Adds {3} Void counters to the hero. Consumes all Essence, applies Dispel {2} (reduces duration) to all buffs on the hero and removes up to {1} from each instance of Warp counters (Hatred, Lust, Despair etc). Resets Focus, Stamina and Morale to their default values.
props.Flavor: It's elementary, really. Just make sure you never mind.

props.Name: Balanced Meditation
props.Description: Hero's Meditation will restore Stamina and Focus by {1}% of what hero's Rest and Concentrate actions would.
props.Flavor: Meditation is a gateway into Oneness of All. There is nothing it cannot achieve.

props.Name: Deep Meditation
props.Description: Meditation mode version that restores {1}% more Essence for each AP spent, but costs 2 AP to activate and gets interrupted for {2}% Toughness damage taken.
props.Flavor: Ones who aspire to penetrate deeper into All must surrender their minds and bodies fully, and accept the possibility of losing them in the process.

props.Name: Essence Link
props.Description: Provides {1} Essence regeneration.

props.Name: Sidestep
props.Description: Adds {2}% Evasion. Hero's Move Left and Move Right actions cost {1}% less ATB.

props.Name: Iron Shoulders
props.Description: Provies {1} additional Toughness and {2} resistance to Bludgeoning damage. Also increases maximum carrying capacity by {3], but reduces Dexterity by 2.

props.Name: Regeneration
props.Description: Provides +25 bonus to Endurance regeneration.

props.Name: Stamina Training
props.Description: Provides +10 Stamina bonus.

props.Name: Cool Headed
props.Description: Hero will not lose Morale when allies are slain nearby. Adds {1}% Focus Retainment

props.Name: Astral Link
props.Description: Provides {1} Resistance against all Astral energies - Arcane, Chaos, Death, Psionic, Shadow and Holy and increases your Willpower, Spellpower and Wisdom by 1.

props.Name: Drill
props.Description: Toughness Restoration and Morale/Focus Retainment are increased by {1}% each.

props.Name: Controlled Engagement
props.Description: When Engaged in Close Quarters, Attacks of Opportunity will be {1}% more accurate for you and less so against you.

props.Name: Grapple
props.Description: Adds {1}% Strength

props.Parameter_Bonuses: Interruption Resistance({1}); Fear Resistance({1}); Wounds Resistance({1});
props.Name: Blooded
props.Description: Grants {2} War Alignment. Interruption effects drain {1}% less Action Points and Focus, Fear effects drain {1}% less Morale, and Wounds (low endurance) give {1}% less penalty to maximum Action Points. :: -2 Charisma, +2 Willpower

props.Name: Footwork
props.Description: Reduces all Turn and Movement action costs by 15%. Increases the chance to win Reaction rolls against enemy Instant Attacks upon movement by 25% (whenever you step onto a cell occupied by a prepared enemy).
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Move Ap Penalty(-{1});Move Sta Penalty(-{1});Reaction Roll Save Bonus({2});

props.Name: Flurry
props.Description: Decreases ATB costs of all your attacks by {1}%.
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Attack Ap Penalty(-{1});Offhand Attack Ap Penalty(-{1});

props.Name: Wingfoot
props.Description: Adds Lounge action that lets hero make a 2 cell leap and strike at a target in one go. Hero cannot be Stopped by enemy Instant Attacks.

props.Name: Steps and Turns
props.Description: Grants the hero ability to turn once per round in either direction for 1 stamina instantaneously, and for 2 stamina - to turn about. These abilities are best found in the Radial Menu.
props.Actives: Quick Turn Anticlockwise;Quick Turn Clockwise;Turn About Clockwise;Turn About Anticlockwise

props.Name: Insight
props.Description: Grants bonus Knowledge equal to {1}% of hero's Wisdom, up to {2}.
props.Flavor: I see the connections now - nothing is apart from the Oneness, and so everything is Known.
props.Dev_Notes: Grants bonus Intelligence equal to {1}% of the total of Principle Alignments

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Body Mind/Meditation Mastery/Presence of Mind.png
props.Name: Presence of Mind
props.Description: Grants a {2}% save and beat bonus to all Quick Wit, Reflex, Reaction and Detection rolls and provides Defense equal to {1}% of from hero's Wisdom.
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Defense({Wisdom}*{1}/100);Reflex Roll Beat Bonus|Quick Wit Roll Beat Bonus|Detection Roll Beat Bonus|Reaction Roll Beat Bonus|Reflex Roll Save Bonus|Quick Wit Roll Save Bonus|Detection Roll Save Bonus|Reaction Roll Save Bonus({2});

props.Name: Old Wounds
props.Description: Critical damage is reduced by {1}%. Can survive in Unconscious state with down to -50% Toughness rather than -35%.

props.Name: Fleeting Ingenuity
props.Description: Before casting an Air spell, your Spellpower will be increased by a random percentage up to {1}%.
props.Dev_Notes: After casting an Air spell, your next spell will ignore {1}% of target's Resistance.

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Body Mind/Meditation Mastery/The Way of Now.png
props.Name: Fluidity
props.Description: Increases your Defense by {1} for each Moist counter you have, up to {2}.

props.Name: Dark Fire
props.Description: Unlocks Dark Fire spell upgrades.

props.Name: Water Affinity
props.Description: Increases your Acid and Poison Resistances by {1}%, Defense by {2}% and Endurance Regeneration by {3}

props.Name: Celerity
props.Description: After casting an Air spell, hero gains {1} Initiative.

props.Name: Cold Energies
props.Description: Unlocks Frozen spell upgrades, increases all Cold damage hero deals by {1}%.

props.Name: Flameborn
props.Description: Hero gains {1} Blaze counters at the start of each new round and converts up to {1} Encase counters to Lava counters

props.Name: Fire Chanter
props.Description: Hero receives {1} Blaze counters each time they cast a Fire or Destruction spell and {2} Fire Resistance

props.Name: Equanimity
props.Description: Hero gains {3} Wisdom, {1}% bonus to all rolls against Mind-Affecting effects. Removes up to {2} Rage and Blaze counters each turn.

props.Name: Ocean Soul
props.Description: Hero generates {1} Moist counters per turn and gains {2} Chaos resistance and {3} Essence regeneration for each Moist counter on them, up to {4}.

props.Name: Fire Affinity
props.Description: Increases your Fire Resistance by {1}%, attack Damage by {3}% and reduces Spell AP costs by {2}%

props.Passives: SpellGroupParamMod(Spell tags,Wind,@, Spellpower mod, {1});SpellGroupParamBonus(Spell tags,Wind,@, Spellpower bonus, {2});
props.Image: gen/entity kills/Prime Arts/Air Mastery/Master of Wind.png
props.Name: Master of Wind
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower by {2} plus additional {1}% when casting Wind spells

props.Name: Electric Flux
props.Description: Adds {1} Electrified counters to the hero when casting Lightning spells.

props.Passives: SpellGroupParamMod(Spell tags,Lightning,@, Spellpower mod, {1});SpellGroupParamBonus(Spell tags,,Lightning,@, Spellpower bonus, {2});
props.Image: gen/entity kills/Prime Arts/Air Mastery/Master of Lightning.png
props.Name: Master of Lightning
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower by {2} plus additional {1}% when casting Wind spells

props.Name: Wind Affinity
props.Description: Increases your Sonic Resistance by {1}, Initiative Modifier by {2}% and Resistance Penetration by {3}

props.Name: Lightning Affinity
props.Description: Increases your Lightning Resistance by {1}, Base Focus by {2}%, Intelligence by {4} and Accuracy by {3}

props.Passives: SpellGroupParamMod(Spell tags,Water,@, Spellpower mod, {1});SpellGroupParamBonus(Spell tags,Water,@, Spellpower bonus, {2});
props.Image: gen/entity kills/Prime Arts/Water Mastery/Master of Water.png
props.Name: Master of Water
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower by {2} plus additional {1}% when casting Water spells

props.Passives: SpellGroupParamMod(Spell tags,Ice,@, Spellpower mod, {1});SpellGroupParamBonus(Spell tags,Ice,@, Spellpower bonus, {2});
props.Image: gen/entity kills/Prime Arts/Water Mastery/Master of Ice.png
props.Name: Master of Ice
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower by {2} plus additional {1}% when casting Ice spells

props.Passives: SpellGroupParamMod(Spell tags,Fire,@, Spellpower mod, {1});SpellGroupParamBonus(Spell tags,Fire,@, Spellpower bonus, {2});
props.Name: Master of Flames
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower by {2} plus additional {1}% when casting Fire spells

props.Passives: SpellGroupParamMod(Spell tags,Lava,@, Spellpower mod, {1});SpellGroupParamBonus(Spell tags,Lava,@, Spellpower bonus, {2});
props.Name: Master of Lava
props.Lore: Masters of Lava are more patient than their pyromantic brethren, but no less determined to spread destruction and Change. Theirs is the power of slumbering, dark hatred; lying deep and unknown to the world of light.
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower by {2} plus additional {1}% when casting Lava spells
props.Flavor: Let's remind the world that is already on fire, it just does not know it yet.

props.Name: Lava Affinity
props.Description: Increases your Physical Resistance by {1}%, Spellpower by {2}% and Natural Armor by {3}

props.Name: Inner Flame
props.Description: Hero gains {3} Light Emission and their Essence regeneration is increased by {1}, Endurance - twice as much. Removes up to {2} Frost counters from the hero each turn.

props.Name: Ice Affinity
props.Description: Increases your Piercing, Cold and Death Resistances by {1}%, Memorization Cap by {2} and Toughness by {3}

props.Name: Fires of Rage
props.Description: Grants the hero {1} Rage counters each time they are struck. These counters increase offensive abilities at the cost of defense, and may result in the hero going Berserk.

props.Name: Sadist
props.Description: Unlocks Contaminated spell upgrades. Doubles Poison effects against Bleeding units.

props.Name: Bone Mastery
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower when casting Bone spells by {1}.

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Death Arts/Blood Magic Mastery/Flesh Mastery.png
props.Name: Flesh Mastery
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower when casting Flesh spells by {1}.

props.Name: Wraith Affinity
props.Description: Hero receives +{1} Cold, Psionic, Death and Acid resistance.

props.Name: Bone Affinity
props.Description: Hero receives +{1} Piercing, Sonic, Lightning and Poison resistance.

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Death Arts/Blood Magic Mastery/Smell of Blood.png
props.Name: Smell of Blood
props.Description: Units with less than {1}% Endurance can always visible

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Death Arts/Blood Magic Mastery/Blood Contamination.png
props.Name: Blood Contamination
props.Description: Unlocks Contaminated spell upgrades. Doubles Poison effects against Bleeding units.

props.Name: Spreading Contagion
props.Description: Affliction spells inflict additional buff that makes Disease counters spread onto nearby living creatures.

props.Name: Soul Mastery
props.Description: {1} Peace Alignment, reduces War Identity by {2}

props.Name: Pale Aspect
props.Description: Souls counters effects are increased by {1}%

props.Name: Reanimation
props.Description: You regenerate 1 Undying counter per turn but cannot have more than {1}.

props.Name: Venomancer
props.Description: Increases hero's Spellpower when casting Poison spells by {1}.

props.Name: Toxic Energies
props.Description: Unlocks Toxic spell upgrades.

props.Name: Corrosive Energies
props.Description: Unlocks Toxic spell upgrades.

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Death Arts/Blood Magic Mastery/Dispassionate Killer.png
props.Name: Surgeon
props.Description: Unlocks Contaminated spell upgrades. Doubles Poison effects against Bleeding units.

props.Name: Wraith Mastery
props.Description: Increases your Spellpower when casting Wraith spells by {1}.

props.Name: Deathly Chill
props.Description: Spreads Freeze counters when casting Necromancy and Ice spells. Unlocks Chilling spell upgrades that add Freeze counters to their targets, reducing Initiative and Endurance regeneration, possibly freezing them solid.

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Death Arts/Blood Magic Mastery/Vampiric Energies.png
props.Name: Vampiric Energies
props.Description: Instead of losing morale when a comrade falls nearby, hero will gain it.

props.Name: Cannibalism
props.Description: Slaying an living unit increases your current Endurance by {1}% of its maximum Endurance, but reduces Initiative by {2}.

props.Name: Plague Doctor
props.Description: Grants {1}% Poison resistance to the hero and {2}% to their party members. Hero also receives {4} Willpower and {3} Charity Alignment.
props.Dev_Notes: Receives ability to remove Poison and Disease counters from self or allies.

props.Name: Deathly Lore
props.Description: Hero's effective Knowledge is increased by {1} for all Death Spells. Provides {2} Death Resistance.

props.Name: Wilting
props.Description: Poison counters deal Death damage based on target's maximum Endurance.

props.Name: Necrotic Energies
props.Description: Targets of your Poison spells will also suffer {1}% penalty to Attack for each Poison counter.

props.Name: Soul Catcher
props.Description: Increases the number of Soul counters gained by {1}%. Amount of counters lost per round is reduced by {2}.

props.Image: gen/entity kills/Death Arts/Blood Magic Mastery/Taste of Flesh.png
props.Name: Taste of Flesh
props.Lore: This peculiar meat diet is good for your muscle, but somehow people seem to dislike your juicy preferences, or is it the teeth that give you away?
props.Description: Increases Vitality and Strength by 1 per heroASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs level, but reduces Charisma by the same amount.

props.Name: Bloodthirst
props.Description: Instead of losing morale when a comrade falls nearby, hero will gain it.

props.Name: Massive Throw
props.Description: Special action that allows you to throw any weapon you have currently equipped at a target within {1} range.
props.Dev_Notes: Allows throwing Medium and Large weapons from hand. Increases the range of all Throw actions by 1.

props.Name: Point Blank Shot
props.Description: Hero doesn't receive any penalties from shooting at adjacent targets.

props.Name: Fast Reload
props.Description: Reload Crossbow actions cost {1}% less Action points.
props.Group: A special action that allows you to reload your crossbow for 1 Action Point but also reduces its Durability by {1}%.

props.Name: Crossbow Specialization
props.Description: Reloading crossbows no longer costs Focus.

props.Name: Deadeye
props.Description: Adds {1} range to your ranged attacks.

props.Name: Bow Specialization
props.Description: Hero doesn't receive any penalties from shooting at adjacent targets.

props.Name: Effortless Brutality
props.Description: Attacks with Two-handed weapons cost {1}% less Stamina.

props.Name: Balance
props.Description: Gain 25% Defense while under effect of Cadence.
props.Group: Allows taking one action after an attack without losing the effect of Cadence.

props.Name: Swift Brutality
props.Description: Attacks with Two-handed weapons cost {1}% less ATB

props.Name: Flurry of Fists
props.Description: Fist attacks will generate Cadence same as Dual Wielding. Further ranks increase the AP cost reduction.

props.Name: Power Cadence
props.Description: Attacks that take advantage of Cadence will deal {1}% more damage.

props.Name: Fearsome Brutality
props.Description: Wielding Twohanded weapons grants the hero Fearsome ({1}) ability that will reduce the Morale of all nearby enemies by {1} whenever they make a melee attack.

props.Name: Precise Brutality
props.Description: Gain {1}% bonus to Attack when using Two-handed weapons.

props.Name: Swift Cadence
props.Description: Cadence effect provides additional {1}% attack costs reduction.

props.Name: Iron Body
props.Description: Grants {1} armor and +{2} to all Natural Resistances.

props.Passives: WeaponParamBuff(weapon group,unarmed,@,str dmg modifier,{1}); GroupPropRemove(name,fist,@,std bools,self damage); GroupParamMod(name,armored fist,@,passives,bashing attack({1},{2}));
props.Name: Iron Fists
props.Description: Normal fist attacks no longer result in self-damage. Armored fist attacks inflict Bash {1}/{2} (reduce focus/initiative).

props.Name: Mighty Blow
props.Description: Fist Swings will generate {1}% more Force and deal additional damage equal to {1}% of hero's Strength.

props.Name: Deadly Precision
props.Description: Unarmed attacks receive bonus damage equal to {1}% of your Agility. Impact area is reduced by {2}%

props.Name: Hardwood Body
props.Description: Grants +{1} to all Natural Resistances.

props.Name: Double Weapons Training
props.Description: Increases hero's Attack value with Two-handed weapons by {1}.

props.Name: Double Cadence
props.Description: Attacks with Two-handed weapons cost {1}% less Action Points.

props.Name: Mid-Pole Block
props.Description: Attacks with Two-handed weapons cost {1}% less Action Points.

props.Name: Raging Brutality
props.Description: Attacks with Two-handed weapons cost {1}% less Action Points.

props.Name: Ambidexterity
props.Description: When wielding two weapons, hero has {1}% more Attack value for Offhand Attacks and half as much for Mainhand Attacks

props.Name: Battle Flow
props.Description: Whenever attacking under effect of Cadence with a weapon other than the last used one, hero gains {1} Focus.
props.Group: Allows taking one action after an attack without losing the effect of Cadence.

props.Name: Broad Reach (Dual)
props.Description: Your offhand weapon may be used to attack targets on your left, and your main weapon - targets on your right. Also grants Side Attack Bonus ({1})%.

props.Passives: ActionMod(Crippling Shot|Aimed Shot,Long Reach Attack Mod({1}));
props.Name: Steady Aim
props.Description: Long Reach attack increased by {1}% for Aimed Shot and Crippling Shot.

props.Name: Practical Eye
props.Description: Throwing weapons deal {1}% more damage.
props.Dev_Notes: Even while unarmed, hero may find a random object to fling at a target. Further ranks increase the damage dealt; Throwing modifiers apply to this action. Also allows the hero to recover arrows from corpses upon using Pick Up.

props.Passives: ActionMod(Crippling Shot|Quick Shot,Side Attack Mod({1});Diagonal Attack Mod({1}));
props.Name: Quick Aim
props.Description: Attack value is increased by {1}% for Quick Shot and Crippling Shot for targets that are not directly ahead from you.

props.Name: Mighty Draw
props.Description: Adds {1} Strength modifier for all Bows

props.Passives: WeaponParamBuff(weapon group,Crossbow,Cunning Aim,Int dmg mod,{1});WeaponParamBuff(weapon group,bow,Cunning Aim,Int dmg mod,{1});
props.Name: Cunning Aim
props.Description: Provides an Intelligence modifier to damage for all Ranged Attacks and allows them to use {1}% of your Sneak Attack bonuses if conditions are met.

props.Passives: ActionParamModBuff(name,Dual Attack, -,sta cost,-{1});ActionParamModBuff(name,Dual Attack, -,ap cost,-{2}); ActionParamModBuff(name,Dual Attack, -,focus cost,-{3}); ActionParamModBuffnBuff(name,Dual Attack, -,focus req,-{3});
props.Name: Synchronized Attack
props.Description: Reduces all costs for Dual Attack action by {1}%
props.Dev_Notes: Dual Attack action point cost now equals to the lowest of the two costs involved. Same weapon size adds a {1}% Attack bonus.

props.Passives: ActionParamModBuff(name,Dual Attack, -,sta cost,-{1});ActionParamModBuff(name,Dual Attack, -,ap cost,-{2}); ActionParamModBuff(name,Dual Attack, -,focus cost,-{3}); ActionParamModBuffnBuff(name,Dual Attack, -,focus req,-{3}); ActionParamModBuff(name,Dual Attack, -,attack mod,{4});
props.Name: Blurred Motion
props.Description: Executes a swift feint action prior to Dual Attack

props.Name: Kick Fighting
props.Description: Unlocks Kick Mode which makes your offhand natural weapon Average Foot with has twice as much Agility damage modifier, double critical modifier but also increased attack costs.

props.Name: Low Kick Mastery
props.Description: Unlocks Kick Mode which makes your offhand natural weapon Average Foot with has twice as much Agility damage modifier, double critical modifier but also increased attack costs.

props.Name: High Kick Mastery
props.Description: Unlocks Kick Mode which makes your offhand natural weapon Average Foot with has twice as much Agility damage modifier, double critical modifier but also increased attack costs.

props.Name: Martial Arts
props.Description: All Unarmed attacks restore {1} Focus upon execution and have their Attack value increased by {2}%.

props.Name: Fist Fighting
props.Description: Attack and Damage are increased by {1}% for all attacks with a Fist.

props.Name: Clinch Fighting
props.Description: Unlocks Grapple action that will disable the target upon successful hit. Each time the target would normally act a Body Strength roll to break the Grapple is made, removing 1 Action Point if failed. Hero may break the Grapple manually after each roll.

props.Name: Bone Crushing Grapple
props.Description: Unlocks Grapple action that will disable the target upon successful hit. Each time the target would normally act a Body Strength roll to break the Grapple is made, removing 1 Action Point if failed. Hero may break the Grapple manually after each roll.

props.Name: Devious Hold
props.Description: Target must win a Quick Wit roll as well as a Body Strength one in order to break from the hero's Grapple.

props.Name: Dual Vengeance
props.Description: Increases Attack score by {2}% when executing Dual Attacks.
props.Dev_Notes: Dual Attack action point cost now equals to the lowest of the two costs involved. Same weapon size adds a {1}% Attack bonus.

props.Name: Hide
props.Description: While in Hide mode, you cannot take any actions but gain +{1}% bonus to Stealth and estore 1 Stamina and 5 Focus for every remaining Action Point at the end of the round.

props.Name: Stealth Mode
props.Description: Gain {1}% Stealth while in this mode. All actions cost {2}% more Actions Points. Cannot be combined with other Continuous Modes such as Search Mode.

props.Name: Backstab Mastery
props.Description: Sneak attacks deal {1}% more damage. Adds {2} Treachery Alignment.

props.Name: Evasion
props.Description: Grants a {1}% chance to evade any incoming missile (spells included). May be reduced by enemy's Accuracy or negated by True Strike.

props.Name: Craftsman
props.Description: Material value Increases the face value of your Armor items by {1}%.
props.Group: All armor and weapon items you purchase have {1}% more durability.

props.Name: Juggernaut
props.Description: All penalties from Heavy Armor are halved.

props.Name: Steel March
props.Description: Move penalties from Heavy Armor are removed.

props.Name: Effortless Retaliation
props.Description: Counter Attacks cost {1}% less Stamina; half of this reduction applies to Instant and Attacks of Opportunity.
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Counter Stamina Penalty(-{1});Aoo Stamina Penalty(-{1}/2);Instant Stamina Penalty(-{1}/2);

props.Passives: WeaponParamBuff(weapon group,Tower Shields,Shield Specialization,damage mod,{1}); WeaponParamBuff(weapon group,Tower Shield,Shield Specialization,penalties,-{1});
props.Name: Tower Shield Specialization
props.Description: You can block up to {1}% more damage with a Tower Shield and receive {1}% less Attack, Move and Cast cost penalties from it.

props.Name: Buckler Specialization
props.Description: You can block up to {1}% more damage with a Buckler.

props.Name: Shield Wall
props.Description: Your Tower Shield's block value is doubled while you Defend. You also become Widely Obstructing for missiles.

props.Name: Armor Tradesman
props.Description: Resistance Grades
props.Group: All armor and weapon items you purchase have {1}% more durability.

props.Name: Skillful Retaliation
props.Description: Counter attacks receive a {1}% bonus to Damage and Attack values.

props.Name: Armored Fists
props.Description: Hero's main natural weapon is now Armored Fists of the same material that their Armor Item. Works only with Metal armor.

props.Name: First Strike
props.Description: Grants hero First Strike. They will make their Counter Attacks before the incoming attack lands, possibly killing the attacker first.

props.Name: Blacksmith
props.Description: Decreases the rate at which your Metal items lose Durability by {1}%.
props.Group: All armor and weapon items you purchase have {1}% more durability.

props.Name: Death Disk
props.Description: A throw action with a buckler that deals Slashing damage.

props.Name: Meticulous Protection
props.Description: Heavy armor receives additional {1} Cover value.

props.Name: Swift Retaliation
props.Description: Grants a {1}% Counter Point cost reduction.

props.Name: Skillful Defense
props.Description: Increases hero's Defense bonus when using Defend by {1}%.

props.Name: Watchful Defense
props.Description: Hero retains {1}% more Defense against Sneak Attacks and twice as much when Defending and receives {2} additional Detection. At the end of turn, hero gains {3} Focus for each remaining Action Point.

props.Name: Engagement Expertise
props.Description: Hero becomes adept at moving in and out of close quarters combat, gaining {1}% Attack value bonus for Instant Attacks made on engaging and disengaging (retreating) foes, as well as an equal Defense bonus against such attacks.
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Disengagement Attack Mod({1});Disengagement Defense Mod({1});Engagement Attack Mod({1});Engagement Defense Mod({1});

props.Name: Entangle in Melee
props.Description: Instant Attack against enemies that are retreating from or passing through the heroASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs position have a {1}% greater chance to Stop and force them to face the hero instead.
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Stop Disengagement Chance Mod({1} );Stop Passage Chance Mod({1} );Stop Flight Chance Mod({1} );

props.Passives: SetProp(Natural Weapon, Armored Fist);SetProp(Offhand Natural Weapon, Armored Fist);
props.Name: Fist of Steel
props.Description: Special unarmed attack that deals additional damage based on your Armor and Strength.

props.Name: Woodcraft
props.Description: Wooden items have their base value increased by {1}% (damage/durability) and their Hardness - by {2}.
props.Group: All armor and weapon items you purchase have {1}% more durability.

props.Name: Skincraft
props.Description: Leather Armor receives an additional Armor Layer.
props.Group: All armor and weapon items you purchase have {1}% more durability.

props.Name: Trinket Handler
props.Description: Increases the face value of your Armor items by {1}%.
props.Group: All armor and weapon items you purchase have {1}% more durability.

props.Name: Fearsome Armour
props.Description: All penalties from Heavy Armor are halved.

props.Name: Shady Habits
props.Description: Adds {1} to your Stealth value. Subtracts {2} from your Honor Alignment.

props.Name: Streetwise
props.Description: Adds {1} to your Stealth value.

props.Name: Stalker
props.Description: Gain {1}% Stealth while in this mode. All actions cost {2}% more Actions Points. Cannot be combined with other Continuous Modes such as Search Mode.

props.Name: Jarring Impact
props.Description: Whenever hero blocks a melee attack with their shield, the attacker loses {1} Stamina and {2} ATB position

props.Name: Deflection
props.Description: Increases block chance against incoming attacks by {1}%.
props.Dev_Notes: Reduces the amount of durability your shield loses by {1}%. Increases block chance against attacks coming from the sides by {2}%.

props.Name: Shattering Impact
props.Description: Weapons lose durability upon being shield-blocked by the hero.

props.Name: Momentous Impact
props.Description: Blocked Melee attackers are subject to Force effect with value of {1} plus {2}% of the attack's own Force.

props.Name: Quick Bash
props.Description: Enables Instant Attacks for Shield Bash.

props.Name: Shield Retaliation
props.Description: Increases the damage and attack values of all Counter Attacks made with a Shield by {1}% both.

props.Name: Alloy Coating
props.Description: Increases Physical Resistance Grades for all Metal Armor by one degree per rank.
props.Group: All armor and weapon items you purchase have {1}% more durability.

props.Passives: ParamBonus(Poison Counter Applied Per Hit Mod, {1});ParamBonus(Disease Counter Applied Per Hit Mod, {1});ParamBonus(Corrosion Counter Applied Per Hit Mod, {1});
props.Name: Pilfer
props.Description: Increases the maximum of Poison, Disease and Corrosion counters applied per hit by {1}%. Grants 25 Poison Resistance.

props.Passives: ParamBonus(Poison Counter Applied Per Hit Mod, {1});ParamBonus(Disease Counter Applied Per Hit Mod, {1});ParamBonus(Corrosion Counter Applied Per Hit Mod, {1});
props.Name: Coating Mastery
props.Description: Increases the maximum of Poison, Disease and Corrosion counters applied per hit by {1}%. Grants 25 Poison Resistance.

props.Name: Expert Parry
props.Description: When using non-Tiny non-Natural melee weapons, you have {1} chance to Parry incoming melee attacks from non-Tiny non-Natural non-Magical weapons. Weapon will take Durability damage.

props.Name: Skillful Parry
props.Description: When using non-Tiny non-Natural melee weapons, you have {1} chance to Parry incoming melee attacks from non-Tiny non-Natural non-Magical weapons. Weapon will take Durability damage.

props.Name: Debilitating Stabs
props.Description: Sneak attacks drain up to {1} Stamina from their target.

props.Name: Fear Dark
props.Description: Sneak attacks drain up to {1} Morale from their target.
